welcome_text: GREAT PROPERTY WITH 3 SELF CONTAINED UNITS
overview_text:
Large Building - 3, 084 Sq. Ft As Per MPAC. This Property Is Situated On An Excellent Large Treed Lot Which Sides Onto A Creek And Pathway. Detached Garage. 
Apartment #1 - 2 Bedrooms With 2 Baths
Apartment #2 - 1 Bedroom With 1 Bath
Apartment #3 - 1 Bedroom With 1 Bath
features_text:
Furnace - 2007, 
Flat Roof - 2019 Approximately, 
Shingles - 2016 Approximately, 
Eaves & Soffits - 2019
Both Tenants Are Fabulous Tenants Who Wish To Stay.
